item.description:
This gathering is for women who are on a spiritual journey of self discovery and who are interested in learning new practices that will give them inner strength and connection to their deep feminine wisdom.

During our first meet up we will explore:

- practices that will support your radiant aliveness and self-confidence, help you embody your joy and bliss, and leave you feeling grounded, centered and peaceful.

- reconnecting with your Sacred Essence as a Goddess and awaken the Shakti* energy within

During this first meet up we will set a foundation of a community of awakening women, who practice together and individually, supported by the Feminine Cosmic Energy.

Price: $10

*feminine
item.how_to_find_us: I will lead the meet up
item.name: Self Discovery through sacred practices
